hooks.command: if [ -z "$TMUX" ]; then echo '[Hook] Consider using tmux for long-running commands' >&2; fi
echo '[Hook] Blocking unnecessary .md file creation. Use only README, architecture.md, or reviews.' >&2; exit 1
echo '[Hook] Review changes before pushing:' >&2; git diff --stat HEAD~1 >&2
if command -v ruff &> /dev/null; then ruff format "$TOOL_OUTPUT_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi
if command -v prettier &> /dev/null; then prettier --write "$TOOL_OUTPUT_PATH" 2>/dev/null; fi
if grep -q 'console\.log\|print(' "$TOOL_OUTPUT_PATH" 2>/dev/null; then echo '[Hook] Warning: Found console.log/print statement' >&2; fi
if [ -f .task_state.json ]; then echo '[Hook] Task state saved to .task_state.json' >&2; fi
